briefTitle: Olanzapine for the Treatment of Chronic Nausea and/or Vomiting in Advanced Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Olanzapine for the Treatment of Chronic Nausea and/or Vomiting, Unrelated to Chemotherapy or Radiation, in Advanced Cancer Patient - A Pilot, Dose-Finding Trial
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the use of olanzapine for the treatment of cancer patients with chronic nausea and/or vomiting unrelated to chemotherapy or radiation in a randomized placebo-controlled pilot trial.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Nausea score from the Visual Analogue Scale will be recorded each day daily for 7 days. An average value calculated will be reported for the 7 day period.
